nodes.text: Yubals were pack animals that were domesticated by the Chiss on the planet Celwis. The family of rancher Xodlak'phr'ooa had a herd of yubals, and could lure them using lure sticks, and herd them using growzers.

According to the young Chiss girl Lakris, yubals were some of the dumbest things on four legs. However, the Agbui youngling Frosif insisted that she had seen dumber animals trained to do actual tricks.
